abilities.name: Guard
abilities.effect: As long as Snorlax is your Active Pokémon, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat. This power stops working when Snorlax is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Roll Over
attacks.effect: Snorlax is now Asleep. Flip a coin, If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
